## BaseHooks type

Used to constrain `Hooks` in [HookDriver](./processor.hookdriver.md) to be a type that all its value are [HookFn](./processor.hookfn.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type BaseHooks<T extends {} = {}> = Record<keyof T, HookFn>;
```
<b>References:</b> [HookFn](./processor.hookfn.md)
